title: AJO Entity Fields
description: A set of meta-data fields related to various AJO entities which are related to message sent to profile.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: AJO Campaign Entity
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: AJO Campaign Entity Specific Fields

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: AJO Campaign ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: AJO Campaign ID. Remains unchanged even after republishing.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: AJO Campaign Version ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: AJO Campaign Version ID. Changes on republishing. Represents immutable version of campaign.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: AJO Campaign Name
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: AJO Campaign Name.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: AJO Campaign Description
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: AJO Campaign Description.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Campaign Action ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Action ID of the Campaign that triggered this message execution.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: AJO Channel/Message Entity
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: AJO Channel/Message Entity Specific Fields. Denormalized on variantId

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Email Specific Fields
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Email Specific Fields

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Email Subject
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Email subject, non-personalized

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Push Specific Fields
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Push Specific Fields.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Push Title
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Push Title, non-personalized

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Message ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Unique ID representing a non-personalized message sent to the end user.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Base Message ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Represents the base Message ID from which the published message is derived.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Message Publication ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Message Publication ID. Represents a frozen/published version of message.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Channel's variant ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Is not frozen and might remain same between different versions of message publication.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: The channel for which this row corresponds.
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Each specific experience channel defines a constant `@id`.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: The json template used in the message
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: The json template used while sending the message

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Message Publication Time
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Time at which message was published

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: AJO Experiment Entity Specific Fields
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: AJO Experiment Entity Specific Fields

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Treatment ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: This along with experimentId has one to one mapping with messageID

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Experiment ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: This along with treatmentId has one to one mapping with messageID

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Experiment Name
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Name of the experiment

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Treatment Name
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Name of the treatment

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: AJO Journey Entity
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: AJO Journey Entity Specific Fields

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Journey Version ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Represents a frozen version of a Journey

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Journey Name
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Represents the journey name

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Journey ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Represents the journey ID

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Journey Action Name
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Represents the Journey Label

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Journey Action ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Represents the Journey Action ID

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Journey Name and Version
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Represents the concatenated values of Journey Name and Version
